name: Knight & Damsel
description: Knight & Damsel is a two-player "uncooperative" multiplayer game set on a papercraft stage that subverts the age-old tale of knights saving damsels, with the knight and damsel competing to rescue the other!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9c-compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controllers or Direct Input compatible controllers preferred
